title: How Many Time Intervals
text: Given $$t$$ represents 5-minute intervals since noon, how many 5-minute intervals are between noon and $$1$$ p.m.?

title: Cars Entered
text: Using $$t$$ $$=$$ $$12$$, if we are given that $$10$$ cars enter every $$5$$ minutes, how many total cars entered the lot between noon and $$1$$ p.m.?

title: Cars Left
text: Using $$t$$ $$=$$ $$12$$, if we are given that $$5$$ cars leave every $$5$$ minutes, how many total cars left the lot between noon and $$1$$ p.m.?

title: Consider Initial Cars
text: Now that you've calculated the rate of change of cars entering and leaving, how can you consider the total cars entered and left? Recall that you are given that there are $$800$$ cars at noon.

title: Compute the Ratio of Cars Entered to Cars Left
text: Using the total number of cars that entered and left, craft a ratio (fraction).
